allow:

fix(vue): deep sync for objects and arrays

- Added Vue watch with deep: true for nested object/array changes
- Automatic watcher setup/cleanup for complex values
- Fixed dedup with strict equality comparison
- Added 15 comprehensive tests for sync scenarios
- All tests passing (44/44)

Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" pr list --state open)
Bash(do "C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" pr close $pr --comment "Closing outdated PR after major update to v5")
Bash(timeout 30 bun run scripts/index.ts compile alak)
